statements: UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 150.50, transaction_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 101
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET user_id = 105, transaction_type = 'BUY' WHERE transaction_id = 102
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET user_id = 456, transaction_type = 'Buy' WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, currency = 'USD' WHERE transaction_id = 1
UPDATE users SET balance = balance + 500.75, first_name = 'John' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE transactions SET currency = 'USD', amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 12345 AND user_id = 56789;
UPDATE users SET balance = balance + 50.75, first_name = 'John' WHERE user_id = 56789;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET amount = 10.5, receiver_address = 'new_receiver_address' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', balance = 500.75 WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_transactions SET sender_address = 'new_address', amount = 10.5 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2002;
UPDATE transaction SET currency = 'USD' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user SET balance = 1500.50, name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = '456e89b-12d3-123e-4266-426614174000';
UPDATE user SET balance = balance + 1000.50 WHERE id = 'b734a5a9-3c64-4bd2-a798-af5d7e532810';
UPDATE wallet SET balance = balance - 500.75, currency = 'USD' WHERE user_id = '98aef647-9a74-4c08-aaac-fd76aa7f6c5c';
UPDATE users SET balance = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE wallets SET balance = 500.50, currency = 'USD' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 75.50, timestamp = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = 5;
